subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Poland Coach Waldemar Fornalik was fired after his team’s 2-0 loss to England in a World Cup qualifying match. Croatia Coach Igor Stimac was also fired, after a 2-0 loss to Scotland.
snippet: Poland Coach Waldemar Fornalik was fired after his team’s 2-0 loss to England in a World Cup qualifying match. Croatia Coach Igor Stimac was also fired, after a 2-0 loss to Scotland.
